name: Die Alone
description:
You're a security guard fending off a zombie outbreak. Your pistol might only have a single magazine, but by a roll of the dice you get a new one.

FEATURES:

  • Six unique weapons to shoot zombies with
  • Online leaderboard for you to get the top place on
  • Spooky sound design to keep you on your toes
  • Gritty visual style for all your edgy needs

CONTROLS:

  • WASD: Move
  • MOUSE1: Shoot
  • SPACE: Roll the die

Poor performance? Download the offline version from below.
